short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logout from all the websites on single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An updated & more advanced auto-log out extension for chrome with a ton of personalized options! Automatically logs you out of all or a selection of websites that you specify upon browser close. 

Extremely useful on a shared computer or to enhance privacy. Set all websites (facebook / yahoo mail) to log out upon chrome's closing to ensure no one snoops on you! 

Advanced Auto Log Out also allows for you to specify certain websites to log out, avoiding the hassle when utilizing website with two factor authentication. 

Example:
Set XXXX.com and YYYYY.com to log out automatically
but your work and WWWWW.com will remain logged in

Very easy user interface!
